mapper.select: SELECT stu_id, stu_name, pwd, role, clazz_name FROM student
SELECT student.stu_id, stu_name, upload_time FROM student, upload WHERE clazz_name = #{clazzName} AND student.stu_id = upload.stu_id GROUP BY stu_id ORDER BY upload_time DESC
SELECT stu_id, stu_name FROM student WHERE stu_id NOT IN (SELECT student.stu_id FROM student, upload WHERE clazz_name = #{clazzName} AND student.stu_id = upload.stu_id) AND clazz_name = #{clazzName}
SELECT count(distinct student.stu_id) FROM student, upload WHERE clazz_name = #{clazzName} AND student.stu_id = upload.stu_id
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM student WHERE stu_id NOT IN (SELECT student.stu_id FROM student, upload WHERE clazz_name = #{clazzName} AND student.stu_id = upload.stu_id) AND clazz_name = #{clazzName}
